solution_line_template: {num_pigs} pigs fed for {days_per_week} days is a total of {days_per_week}*{num_pigs}=<<{days_per_week}*{num_pigs}={total_feedings}>>{total_feedings} feedings.

At {pounds_per_feeding} pounds per feeding, this amounts to a total of {pounds_per_feeding}*{total_feedings}=<<{pounds_per_feeding}*{total_feedings}={total_feed_per_week}>>{total_feed_per_week} pounds of pig feed per week.
